channel.title: Google Test Automation Conference on Dominik Dary's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Google Test Automation Conference on Dominik Dary's Blog

item.title: GTAC 2014
item.description: I’m happy to announce that I will give a lightning talk at Google’s Test Automation Conference (GTAC) about selendroid. The schedule of this year’s conference you find here In the mean while I have written together with Michael Palotas an article about Mobile Test Automation with Selendroid in the Methods and Tools Magazine.
